## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G43120](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G43120)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SAUR39</u>
- **Gene Name:** SMALL AUXIN UPREGULATED RNA 39
- **Description:**   SAUR-like auxin-responsive protein family;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2084851
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
